short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Bet Calculator widget for simple bet calculations. Can be used on any website. Turn it on/off with the extension icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple bet calculator widget that you can use on any website to quickly calculate simple bets. It is movable and always floats on top of the page. The widget can be turned on and off quickly with the extension's icon - or turned off completely in the extension settings. 

A more complex bet calculator is also available that you can install as a PWA (Progressive Web App) by clicking on the link below the widget or on the info icon (where you can find more information about the Bet Calculator App) and adding the page to your home screen.
